course.introduction: 在暑假课程期间，学生将学习A2.1级课程。学生已掌握了日常环境和生活中的所有词汇，并且可以结合使用现在、祈使、过去（过去）和将来（将来过程）时态。我们将重点掌握法语语音和阅读，保持良好的阅读流程，复习复杂音素的语音，并重点掌握A2.1级的词汇和语法。
course.introductionEn: During the French camp, students will follow classes level A2.1. They already master all the vocabulary of their direct environment and everyday life, and they can conjugate in present, imperative, past (passé compose) and future (futur proche) tenses. A great focus will be kept in mastering the French phonetics and the reading, in order to maintain a good reading flow and we will review phonetics of complex phonemes. The other mains focus of the French camp is the total mastering of vocabulary and grammar of level A2.1.
course.designateTextbook: Tailor made manual : All in one French book自编
course.referenceTextbook: Alter Ego, Amical, Edito, and different phonetics and vocabulary manuals

course.introduction:
"本课程以介绍计算机图形学领域的最新的研究成果及进展为主，为大家展示授课老师在各方向的出色的研究工作，使大家聚焦科研最前沿的工作和进展。课程同时兼顾本科生也介绍该领域的一些基本问题和研究方向，多视角、多层面地深入到各个热点方向的最新研究动态。

课程的内容涵盖计算机图形学、CAD/CAE/CAM、计算机视觉、可视化、虚拟现实与增强现实、图像处理、人机交互等内容。
course.introductionEn: This course aims to provide the state-of-the-art progress of computer graphics to students by introducing the recent works of the lecturers which let students catch the advances of this field. The course also provides some fundamental knowledge and research works for undergraduate students with various promising development trends.

course.introduction: 构造地质学野外实习内容遵循由简到繁、循序渐进的教学规律和地质填图工作的一般过程。教学进程可划分为四个阶段：一、实习准备；二、教师野外指导学生观察构造现象及实习区典型地层剖面；三、学生分组独立填图；四、编写实习报告。在实习过程中还注意参观一些典型的地质陈列馆,如中国地质大学北京周口店陈列馆、中国科学院北京猿人遗址及陈列馆和中国地质博物馆等。上述陈列馆中有丰富的关于本专业的实物和图片陈列，在教师和馆内工作人员的现场讲解下，可使学生获得课本上所不能得到的知识。
course.introductionEn: The teaching process can be divided into four stages. The First stage is preparation for field trip of structural geology; the second stage is that the students’ observations on structural features and typical stratigraphic profiles in the area guided by the teachers; the third stage is that the students will be divided into several groups by three to four students for each one and carry out geological mapping independently; the last stage is that the students should prepare and put in the practice report. During the filed trip the students can visit some geological museums such as the Beijing Zhoukoudian Museum of the China University of Geosciences, the Peking Man Site Museum of Chinese Academy of Sciences and the China Geological Museum. There are various objects and pictures about our major on display in these museums, which could cause the students to get the knowledge that can not be obtained from the books.
course.referenceTextbook: 《构造地质学》朱志澄 主编 中国地质大学出版社

course.introduction: 大气科学基础实习主要面向大气科学专业二年级本科生开设，通过黄山市气象局（含地面基准站）与黄山气象管理处（含高山气象站和雷达站）的实习，了解大气探测与气象预报等系列业务流程。此外，在实习基地，利用便携自动气象站实地测量气象要素场，分析其基本变化规律，从而加强学生的实践动手能力，加深其对大气专业基础知识的理解和掌握。
course.introductionEn: The Fundamental Practice of Atmospheric Science is mainly for sophomores majoring in atmospheric science. Through the practice of Huangshan Meteorological Bureau (including ground reference station) and Huangshan Meteorological Management Office (including alpine meteorological station and radar station), we can understand the business processes of atmospheric detection and weather forecasting. In addition, portable automatic weather stations are used to measure meteorological element fields in the field, analyze their basic change patterns, thereby strengthening students' practical skills and deepening their understanding and mastery of basic knowledge in atmospheric science.
course.referenceTextbook:
《大气边界层探测实习教程》，王成刚，气象出版社，201908，ISBN：9787502970123

course.introduction: 生物学野外实习是在学生学习了植物学、动物学或普通生物学等课程之后进行的实践教学环节。通过野外实习，学生可以了解和掌握动植物标本的采集和制作方法、动植物标本的鉴定和识别技能、动植物资源调查技术，以及领略当地的自然风情和人文社会环境。西双版纳热带植物园具有12000种植物和热带雨林，是生物学野外实习的理想场所。
course.introductionEn: Biology field practice is a practice teaching after the students learning botany, zoology or biology course. Through the field practice, students can understand and master the specimen collection and preparation method, animal and plant specimens for identification and recognition skills, animal and plant resources survey technique, and the taste of the local natural scenery and Humanities and social environment. Xishuangbanna Tropical Botanical Garden has 12000 plants and tropical rain forests, is an ideal place for biology field practice.

course.introductionEn: Ecological teaching practice is a course on the study methods of ecology practice teaching activity. Through the practice study group, to carry out research, to cultivate students’ interest in learning, exercise the ability to work, attempt to research process. YaoLuoping national natural protection area to carry out ecological research field practice teaching, and established the base of field teaching practice in Yuexi county.

course.introduction:
本课程是面向全校各院系本科生开设的一门公共选修课。

        课程将从实用的角度，介绍LINUX系统管理和高级应用相关的主题，主要内容包括：LINUX综述;基本安装和配置;涵盖文件系统、内存与进程管理、网络等系统基本管理操作;Apache Web服务器、FTP服务及其他各类常用RPM包安装与更新; Shell 脚本以及LINUX环境下数据库与高级语言编程模式等。

        由于安全性、稳定性和知识产权等综合因素，大型组织或公司更青睐于选用UNIX/LINUX作为应用平台。而国内外目前可从事高级LINUX管理和应用的人才非常紧缺。本课程不仅可帮助学生弥补“LINUX应用”知识结构缺陷，为毕业后的求职加分，也有利于参加Linux系统工程师/软件工程师等相关认证考试。
course.introductionEn: "This course is presented as a common optional course for all computer science and engineering students of USTC.This course offers practical knowledge for managing Linux servers. Topics to be covered include: introduction to Linux; installation and configuration of Linux; manage file systems, users, or kernel’s access to processor time, devices, and memory etc; install and configure network services, Apache web server, FTP, MySQL and other RPM package; create shell scripts and adapt them for your own needs; build C/JAVA applications.Linux is well-known for its reliability, flexibility, low cost of ownership, and technical elegance. It is now a standard corporate platform with users numbering in the hundreds of millions, and there is a definite shortage of talented administrators. This course will be helpful to students who want to rationalize their knowledge structure and prepare the LINUX certification exams. programs faster and more reliable.This course will provide a programmer’s view of how computer systems execute programs, store information, and communicate in a broad and practical perspective, explain the relative underlying concepts, mechanism, and present some concise & valuable abstraction models. Topics covered include: information representing, processor architecture and protected mode, memory organization and management, machine-level /assembly code and its generation by optimizing compilers, process, program linking, loading and performance evaluation, Linux file system, etc."
course.referenceTextbook: Tom Adelstein. Linux System Administration. O'Reilly Media, 2007.

course.introduction: 本课程针对管理科学与工程专业三年级本科生设计。目的在于让学生接触与认识企业生产实际，并开展应用性调查研究。实习学生通过观察、走访、座谈等方法感知和了解企业生产运作程序及其效率，分析其中存在的问题，并运用所学理论、方法和工具对特定生产线或物流供应链的改进，提出优化方案。
course.introductionEn: This course is designed for the 3th undergraduates of management science and engineering. The purpose is to make students contact and understand the practical production of enterprises, and to carry out applied researches. Internship students through observation, visits, seminars and other methods to perceive and understand of the program operation and  production efficiency of the  enterprise, to analyze problems and apply learned theories, methods and tools to improve a particular production line or the logistics supply chain,  propose optimization solution.

course.introduction: 本课程针对工商管理精英班三年级本科生设计。目的在于通过走进企业，了解和研讨企业管理实践，提高对学所工商管理理论与方法的理解，并在实践感知的基础上对所学书本知识加以整合。于大三升大四的暑期，由班主任和指导老师共同带队集中实习。在实习企业确定之后学生按管理职能分成若干小组，分别开展前期信息收集，再集中举行企业调研，进而分组撰写研究报告，最后集中举行交流汇报。
course.introductionEn: This course is designed for the 3th year undergraduates of junior elite classes in business administration. The purpose is to understand and discuss business management practices, to improve the understanding of the business administration theory and method what they have learned, and to integrate the book knowledge through into the enterprise. During the summer between junior and senior, these students will be concentration trained under the leadership of the class advisors and instructors. After the internship companies are determined, the students would be divided into several groups according to administrative functions to carry out the collection of preliminary information separately, and then be concentrated to hold a business research in order to write research reports in groups, finally, to be concentrated to hold a  communication report .

course.introduction: 以自主设计性为主的物理实验课题探究，自主设计实验方案，搭建实验装置，应用综合实验方法和技能, 及现代物理实验技术和方法系统地进行力学、电磁学、光学物理量的测量。每学期提前设置实验小课题，由学生自由选择课题，在学期时间内完成实验探究并参加答辩获取成绩，培养学生综合创新实践能力。
course.introductionEn: This course focuses on exploring physics experimental topics with independent design, designing experimental plans, constructing experimental equipment, applying comprehensive experimental methods and skills, and systematically measuring mechanical, electromagnetic, and optical physical quantities using modern physics experimental techniques and methods. Each semester, small experimental topics are set up in advance, and students are free to choose topics. During the semester, they complete experimental exploration and participate in defense to obtain grades, and cultivate their comprehensive innovation and practical abilities.

course.introduction: 物理化学III是一门横跨物理化学多个分支的综合课程，结合介绍现代计算机化学及其在生物化学、材料科学、环境化学等研究课题方面的应用。课程突出强调物理化学的基本概念及其内在的紧密相互关系，注重解决实际问题的思路与能力。课程重点介绍量子力学基础、变分法、微扰理论、分子轨道理论、密度泛函理论、基函数、电子相关等一系列量子化学概念与方法，同时介绍分子光谱、统计力学、热力学、反应动力学等分支学科中的基本内容与重要概念，最后介绍计算机化学在蛋白质和DNA结构、大气污染及环境化学研究中的一些应用实例。课程全程用英语授课，学生作业与考试全部使用英语。
course.introductionEn: Physical Chemistry III is an integrated course that covers all major topics of modern physical chemistry along with modern computational chemistry and applications in current research areas, including biochemistry, material science, and environmental chemistry. The course focuses on fundamental concepts and internal relationships among various topics of physical chemistry as well as on practical skills and techniques in solving research problems. The course selectively gives in-depth lectures as well as highlights on quantum mechanics, variational methods, perturbation theory, molecular orbital theory, density functional theory, basis set, electron correlation, computational methods and techniques, molecular spectroscopy, statistical mechanics, thermodynamics, intermolecular forces, applications of computational chemistry in protein and DNA structures and in air pollution and other environmental problems. All lectures are delivered in English. Homework assignments and exams are given in English and are expected to be completed in English.

course.referenceTextbook: "“Essentials of Computational Chemistry” 2nd Ed. by C. Cramer, Wiley“Physical Chemistry”6th Edition, by I.N. Levine, McGraw-Hill"

course.introduction: 信息科技日新月异，计算机仿真不但是研究物理的工具，也成为找寻与设计新材料的一大利器。本课程要以每周一个独立单元的明快进度，向学生们介绍如何利用最先进的材料计算计算机仿真软件与3D交互式图形接口来预测材料的性质。内容涵盖传统固态物理学之材料的晶体结构、能带结构、机械性质、电学性质、光学性质、磁学性质等重要主题，同时兼顾科技应用及广度，可协助学生培养研究的基础及提升就业的竞争力。
course.introductionEn: This course introduces the density functional theory and its applications. It is organized by three parts as follows: 1) Fundamental theory: establishing the Kohn-Sham equation,introducing the basic concepts, such as the supercell, fractional occupied state, the projected density of states, band structure, Brillouin zone and k sampling, etc 2) Modeling: Constructing computational models of supercell, doped crystals, crystals with defects to study the impact of impurities and defects on materials performance; Building surface structure through the vacuum layer structure to study surface adsorption and reconstruction.3) Applications: Using CASTEP program to calculate physical quantities such as atomic orbital, molecular structure, chemical bond orders, bond energy, surface reconstruction, work function, cell parameter and density of states. The impact of pseudo-potential choice,regulations of important parameters, accuracy and convergence test on the calculation results are also introduced.

course.introduction: 本课程是“机械设计制造及自动化”和“精密仪器及机械”专业本科生，在完成机械工程学科主要基础和技术基础课程学习后的一个重要实践教学环节。通过本课程的实际生产现场学习，使学生对所学知识及其实际应用有一个较全面、客观的认识，一方面巩固了所学知识，一方面又为后续课程的学习和将来的工作打下较坚实的基础。本课程是一门实践课，通过三周的实际机器的讲解、拆装、测绘、工艺分析，并结合实际工厂的生产现况的参观学习，了解机器（仪器）零件的制造方法和工艺过程以及保证加工质量的工艺途径；了解机器（仪器、仪表）的装配方法和保证质量的工艺途径；了解新技术、新工艺在实际生产中的应用。
course.introductionEn: The course is for the undergraduate students majoring in Machinery and Instrumentation, and it is an important practical course for students who have finished the most elementary and technical courses. Through the study in the manufacturing workshops, students can have a complete and objective understanding of the contents and applications of what they have learned. In this way, on one hand the knowledge students have learned is enhanced; on the other hand it lays the foundation of the follow-up studies and the future work. This is a practical course. By means of introduction, disassembly and assembly, surveying and plotting, technics analysis of real machines or parts, combining with the in-situ visiting and studying of manufacturing processes in the factories, students can understand the production approaches and processes of the equipment parts as well as the technical skills to guarantee the process quality, know the assembly methods and skills of quality control, and also learn the new technology and new processes applied in the practical production.

course.introduction: 本课程系统介绍电路分析的基本概念、基本定律、基本方法和电路定理，包括：Kirchhoff定律及电路元件，电路等效变换，线性直流电路，电路定理，正弦稳态分析，耦合电感与理想变压器，频率特性与谐振，三相电路，非正弦周期电流电路，线性动态电路时域分析，线性动态电路复频域分析，二端口网络，以及电路网络分析基础，非线性直流电路等。
course.introductionEn: The course systematically introduces fundamental concepts、laws、theorems and methods in circuit analysis. The main contents include: Kirchhoff’s Laws and circuit elements, equivalent circuit transform, linear DC circuit, circuit theorems, analysis of the sinusoidal steady-state circuit, coupling inductor and ideal transformer, frequency characteristic and resonance, three-phase circuit, non-sinusoidal periodic current circuit, time-domain analysis of linear dynamic circuit, complex frequency-domain analysis of linear dynamic circuit, two-port network, and fundamental network analysis of circuit, nonlinear DC circuit etc.

course.introduction: 光机电系统的应用日趋广泛。本课程讲授光机电系统涉及到的光学、机械、电路与控制方面的基本理论，特别强调不同学科间的交叉知识和应用。通过本课程的学习，期望学生能掌握光机电系统的基本理论、奠定光机电系统的应用基础。 课程具体内容包括参加长春光机所暑期夏令营或暑期学校，听取光机电前沿学术讲座或报告。
course.introductionEn: Optical, mechanical and electrical systems are applied more and more widely. This course introduces the basic theories of optical, mechanical and electrical systems, and especially addresses some cross knowledge of the concerned areas. After learning the course, students are expected to grasp the basic theories of optical, mechanical and electrical systems, and build a good application foundation on these systems. The content includes participating in the summer camp or summer school of Changchun Optical Machinery Institute and listening to the academic lectures or reports on the frontier of optical machinery and electronics.

course.introduction: 信息科技是一门飞速发展的学科，每年都有一系列新的技术出现。本课程通过在电子信息学科相关的科研院所及高新技术公司，让同学们了解到最前沿的信息科学技术动态，体验最酷的科学技术成果及最新产品，以得到对本门学科更加直观具体的了解。课程内容具体包括参观中科院电子所，见习合成孔径雷达、微波成像技术发展现状、电磁辐射与探测技术、地理与赛博空间信息技术以及信号处理与图像分析技术等；参观中科院自动化所、信息工程所、微电子所等科研单位；参观微软、百度等科技公司，了接最新产品动态。
course.introductionEn: Information technology is a rapidly developing, with a series of new technologies appear every year. By visiting the electronic information science related research institutes and high-tech companies, students will learn the trends of information science and technology, discover the coolest technical achievements and the latest products, and get a more intuitive understanding of what they learn in courses. The content includes: visiting theInstitute of electronics of CAS, synthetic aperture radar, microwave imaging technology, electromagnetic radiation and detection technology, geography and cyber space information technique,signal processing and image analysis technology; visit the Institute of automation, institute of information engineering, Institute of Microelectronics of CAS; visiting Microsoft Research Asia, Baidu and other technology companies.

mngtDepartment.jmRemark: 63607533 刘老师 hqliu@ustc.edu.cn 东区老图书馆3楼

course.introduction:
“综合生物化学与分子生物学实验”为一综合性的实验课程, 教授学生运用一系列的生物化学和分子生物学实验操作完成一个综合实验项目，从葡萄糖异构酶GI的克隆、分离纯化，再到酶活鉴定，让学生初步了解现代分子生物化学的研究思路与各种技术的灵活运用，以及如何对特定实验结果进行科学的分析，培养学生在实践环境中的创新能力，激发大家对科学研究的兴趣。

高级生物化学与分子生物学实验－葡萄糖异构酶GI的克隆、分离纯化和酶活鉴定（共60学时）

1) 大肠杆菌质粒DNA的分离及纯化（5学时）

采用碱变性法小量抽提大肠杆菌质粒DNA。

2) 核酸的琼脂糖凝胶电泳及质粒DNA的酶切反应(3学时)

琼脂糖凝胶电泳, 凝胶成像仪观察拍照，检测DNA样品的纯度、浓度、大小和构型。 将DNA样品用限制型内切酶EcoR I和Hind Ⅲ进行双酶切。 

3) DNA样品的回收及连接(5学时)

利用凝胶回收试剂盒从凝胶中回收目的DNA片段，并与特定的载体片段进行连接反应。

4) 感受态细胞的制备及转化(5学时)

利用氯化钙法制备大肠杆菌感受态细胞，并转化连接反应产物 。

5) 重组质粒的PCR鉴定（5学时）

采用PCR进行扩增，从而快速鉴定阳性克隆。

6) 葡萄糖异构酶在E. coli中的克隆表达(5学时)

接种含GI质粒的K38菌种至LB培养液(含Amp和Kan)中，30℃培养，收集菌体, 用细胞破碎仪破碎细胞，离心，收获粗酶液。

7) 葡萄糖异构酶的分离纯化(8学时)

利用Sephadex G-50小柱进行样品脱盐；利用DEAE-Sepharose FF 离子交换柱层析进行样品分离。

8) 葡萄糖异构酶的性质鉴定(8学时)

GI最适温度、最适pH和热稳定性的测定 。

9) 葡萄糖异构酶的酶动力学性质（8学时）

配制不同浓度的木糖底物－缓冲液混合溶液测定酶活,用双倒数法求出酶的表观Km和Vmax；根据Kcat≈K3≈Vmax/[E]，求Kcat值。

10) 葡萄糖异构酶的分子量和等电点的测定(8学时)

分别用SDS-PAGE、IEF-PAGE测定GI的分子量和等电点.
course.designateTextbook: 李卫芳.生物化学与分子生物学实验（第2版），中国科学技术大学出版社，2021年，ISBN:9787312051333.

course.introduction: 《生活中的化学科普实验》是面向全校非化学专业的低年级本科生所开设的选修课程，共8次课，计40学时，1学分。课程内容是以化学在社会生活中的应用为主线，以人类生活、环境、安全、健康等密切相关的化学现象为切入点，注重实验内容的趣味性和科普性，按照“趣味化学实验”、“生活化学实验”、“综合化学实验”三大模块进行授课，使学生感受化学的精彩和魅力。
course.introductionEn: 《The Popular Science Experiments of Chemistry in Life》is a general selective course during summer vacation, opening for the undergraduate students who are not major in chemistry. The course is consisted by 8 different experiments with 40 credit hours and 1 credit. And is concerning about the application of chemistry experiment in human life, environment, safety, health, et al. The content of the course is divided into three parts, that is "Interesting Chemistry Experiment", "Life Chemistry Experiment" and "Comprehensive Chemistry Experiment". Through the study of the course, students will experience the wonderfulness and charm of chemistry.

course.introduction:
数据库是一门关于数据存储、管理、处理和分析的学科。近年来，随着物联网、云计算等技术的兴起，随着用户生成数据、基于位置的服务等的新型信息发布方式的涌现，数据正以前所未有的速度增长和累积。在这样的背景下，数据库技术得到了快速的发展，新技术和新系统层出不穷。本课程将从数据管理和数据分析角度出发、选择性地讲授和讨论一些数据库领域的前沿主题，以期系统化地向学生介绍数据库技术的一些前沿发展方向，探讨数据管理和大数据系统的新概念、新技术和新应用。

课程由教学和研讨两部分构成。教学内容如提纲所示，共10个学时；研讨内容按照3个主题进行组织，每个主题约10个学时，共30个学时。

第一章 绪论：数据管理前沿综述；课程大纲和教学要求。

第二章 交互式数据探索技术前沿：数据探索技术分类与概述；从多维分析、数据立方体到发现式数据探索；抽样、在线聚集与机器学习在数据探索中应用。

第三章 位置服务与空间关键词检索：位置服务与空间关键词检索概述 ；空间文本对象的索引、动态操作与变种；典型应用举例：基于文本对象的位置影响力分析。

第四章 众包及数据管理技术前沿：众包数据管理概述；众包任务的集成与数据质量管理；众包任务的分配和调度。

Jiawei Han, Micheline Kamber, Jian Pei.Data Mining: Concepts and Techniques, 3rd edition（第3版）， Morgan Kaufmann，2011年，ISBN:9789380931913.

defaultPreCourses.introduction: 本课程以C语言为载体，以培养计算思维和程序设计能力为目标，通过丰富而实用的示例，展示在程序设计过程中如何分析问题、组织数据并解决问题，阐述了在计算应用过程中将算法与编码相联系的具体程序设计过程，以及结构化、模块化程序设计的思想与方法。课程主要内容包括计算机基础、常用语法元素的概念及示例、基本语法与结构化程序设计、模块化程序设计与常用算法和库函数、C语言特有元素与应用示例、程序设计与计算思维深入以及附录。本课程具有两大特色，其一是快速入门，用两章内容使学生从零基础到具备解决简单问题的编程能力，避免因前期枯燥冗长的语法学习而失去对课程的兴趣；其二是侧重能力的培养，不再穷究语法细节，而是引导学生通过自主学习掌握使用计算思维分析和解决问题的方法与技巧，最终得到能力的提升而非简单的知识积累。

程序设计I是一门介绍计算机程序设计基本思想和程序设计语言的课程。本课程以C语言为主要语言进行讲授，让学生能够较好的掌握C程序设计语言，并实践训练让学生具备编写程序求解简单应用问题的能力。

course.introduction:
本课程从计算思维角度讲解计算机科学基础的概念和入门知识，讨论计算思维的四种具体表现形式： 计算逻辑思维、算法思维、网络思维、计算系统思维。为了足够精准地描述信息变换过程，必须用信息的方式定义并推导信息变换过程涉及的“对”与“错”，哪些能计算，哪些不能计算。这是计算逻辑思维，它往往需要精确地定义计算模型。我们还需要从信息的角度发现和发明解决各类问题的精确方法，并评价什么是有效的方法。这是算法思维。有很多问题不是由单个算法解决，而是由多个算法形成网络来描述和解决。研究有效的网络需要网络思维。信息变换过程往往通过具体的计算设备与系统得以体现。如何设计、评价并使用计算抽象和实用的计算系统涉及计算系统思维。

本课程邀请计算机及相关学科具有较高学术造诣的教师，从全球的视野和历史的高度，为同学们介绍各领域的历史、现状与未来，帮助同学建立对各学科较为完整全面的认识，激发学习兴趣。除计算机专业外，涉及专业还包括：大数据、人工智能、网络与通信、自动化、信息安全等。
course.introductionEn: This course focuses on fundamental Computer Science concepts and knowledge, which is centered around the concept of “computing thinking”. The computing thinking consists of four main aspects: computing logic thinking, algorithmic thinking, networking thinking and systems thinking. Specifically, from the perspective of information and information transformation, the computing logic thinking defines what is right and wrong during information processing; the algorithmic thinking concerns how to solve problems with precise methods and how to assess these methods; the networking thinking describes how different algorithms interconnect and form a much bigger solution; the systems thinking realizes actual information transformation processes.

course.introduction: 本课程是“计算+X”交叉学科教育方案的一部分，是与《计算之美与乐趣导引》课紧密衔接的实践性课程。本课程要求学生：（1）尝试构建自己的超级计算机——“学生机群”。通过一组基准测试程序来指导系统设计的优化，在给定的3000W功耗下达到性能最高，了解并行程序性能和可扩展性的评估方法。（2）从科学计算、工程计算、医学计算、社会计算等领域选择一个应用主题的并行软件，尝试分析、优化和运行真实的工作负载，在给定的3000W功耗限制下，达到最好的应用可扩展性和性能。在解决问题的过程中理解高性能计算系统求解问题的重要思想和基本原理，如软硬件协同一体化设计、并行处理、局部性、大概率事件优先、性能度量和优化、系统可靠性与稳定性等，探索高性能计算机系统如何以令人兴奋的方式改变我们的世界。（3）参加校园大学生超算竞赛（SCCC），完成课程研究书面报告和口头报告。

course.introduction: "机器人是多学科、交叉学科的综合体，是最典型的机电一体化产品。对于工科领域的机械工程、电子信息、自动控制、传感器与测试技术、计算机硬件及软件、人工智能等学科均是最佳的教学研究平台。本实验以慧鱼机器人为平台进行机器人设计及调试。慧鱼创意组合模型涵盖了机械、电子、控制、气动、汽车技术、能源技术和机器人技术等领域和高新学科，利用工业标准的基本构件（机械元件/电气元件/气动元件），辅以传感器、控制器、执行器和软件的配合，运用设计构思和实验分析，可以实现任何技术过程的还原，更可以实现工业生产和大型机械设备操作的模拟，从而为实验教学、科研创新和生产流水线可行性论证提供了可能。"
course.introductionEn: " One of the most representative mechatronic products, robots are integration and ideal teaching/research platform of multiple disciplines, including mechanical engineering, electronic informatics, automatic control, sensor and testing technologies, computer hardware/software, and artificial intelligence. This experiment uses Fischertechnik robots as platform for design and debugging.Fischertechnik models of creativeness and combination encompass mechanical, electronic, control, pneumatic, automotive, energy and robotics technologies. They utilize basic industry-standard components (mechanical/electrical/pneumatic components), aided by sensors, controllers, actuators and software. Leveraging design concepts and lab analysis, students can restore a wide variety of technical processes, and furthermore realize the simulation of industrial production and operation of large machinery/equipment, thereby providing feasibility for experimental teaching, research innovation, and validation of production assembly lines."
course.designateTextbook: 慧鱼机器人讲义慧鱼创意机器人初级教程
course.referenceTextbook: 无

course.introduction: 本课程为实验课程，以基于51内核的STC系列单片机为核心，讲解单片机的基本架构和工作原理。在此基础上，主要讲解采用C语言对单片机内部寄存器和外部设备的控制方式。用C语言编写的程序在编译后，生成可执行文件下载到STC8051单片机中，实现单片机对常用外设（如按键、开关、数码管、LED灯、温度传感器、串口等）的控制。本课程不要求学生具有系统的电路知识，只需有C语言的编程基础即可在教师的指导下操作，适合于低年级本科生学习。本课程采用边讲解、边实习的方式进行。
course.introductionEn:
This course is a laboratory course, which is based on a hardware platform with the STC8051 microcontroller as a core. It describes the architecture and principle of 8051 microcontroller, then introduces how to control the registers and peripherals of the microcontroller with C programs. After compiled, the generated executable files are download to memory in microcontroller, controlling those common peripherals, such as led, key, switch, seven-segment LED, temperature sensor, UART etc to work.

It is not necessary for students to obtain the systematic electronic theory, anyone who have the knowledge of C program can do these experiments under the direction of our teachers. This course especially apples to freshman and sophomore, and is in a form of explaining and practicing at same time.
course.referenceTextbook: STC单片机原理及应用，何宾编著，清华大学出版社，2015.9

defaultPreCourses.introduction: 本课程讲授程序设计语言的基本概念和理论。它并非是一门程序设计课程，也不是讲授一门具体程序设计语言的课程，而是要系统介绍各种语言背后的通用概念和理论。从概念上说，将涵盖命令式语言、函数式语言、面向对象语言、并发和并行语言以及逻辑语言的各种基本语言设施，包括控制结构、作用域、内存管理、高阶函数、继承、并发机制、新型并行编程模型等。从理论角度，将给出各种基础语言设施的形式化语义，包括操作语义和指称语义；以及相应的程序验证技术，如Hoare逻辑和类型系统等。授课内容一方面涵盖程序设计语言中各种经典的概念和理论，一方面引入学界最新的研究成果，包括线性类型系统、分离逻辑、基于Region的内存管理、内存一致性模型以及新型并行编程技术等。

course.introduction: 本课程以ARM Cortex-M4 MCU系列微控制器为蓝本，阐述嵌入式系统基本概念和基本应用，嵌入式系统的硬件设计基础与软件设计基础，嵌入式系统基本功能模块：GPIO口、SCI、SPI、A/D、定时器、PWM、I2C的应用设计方法，以及嵌入式系统实际运用中的电磁兼容等注意事项，在理论基础知识讲授的同时并辅以随堂实验，以加深学生对课堂知识的理解和运用。
course.introductionEn: A course based on ARM Cortex-M4 MCU mainly introduces how to design embedded systems from hardware aspect and software aspect, including modules such as GPIO, SCI, SPI, AD, Timer, PWM, I2C etc. The experiments will be carried out in the class following the theoretical knowledge introduction.
course.referenceTextbook: 嵌入式系统原理及应用——基于ARM Cortex-M3内核的STM32F103系列微控制器

course.introduction: 该课程是为我校英语L3和L4学生开设的英语拓展课程，旨在促进学生了解文化差异，提高用英语沟通中西方文化的基本知识英语交流能力。
course.introductionEn:
This course is designed for students of L3 and L4, aiming to enhance their communicative skills in the field of cultural communication and prepare them for international communication.

This course will introduce a blend of Philosophy and Social Psychology to explore beneath the surface of culture. It is intended to look beyond the ‘what’ of culture and develop an understanding of the ‘why’ of culture. Assessment for the course will be the submission of a fully referenced academic essay using the APA format. The course format will be a weekly multimedia lecture and discussion, supported by required and optional readings. Students will be able to choose their essay topic from a selection of topics.

mngtDepartment.jmRemark: 预科生：谢老师 63602251老图书馆2２７室； 军训与军事理论：刑老师 63606080 东区老图书馆410室 junxing@ustc.edu.cn

course.introduction: 该课程是为我校英语L3和L4学生开设的英语拓展课程，旨在促进学生了解文化差异，提高用英语沟通中西方文化的基本知识英语交流能力。
course.introductionEn:
This course is designed for students of L3 and L4, aiming to enhance their communicative skills in the field of cultural communication and prepare them for international communication.

This course will introduce a blend of Philosophy and Social Psychology to explore beneath the surface of culture. It is intended to look beyond the ‘what’ of culture and develop an understanding of the ‘why’ of culture. Assessment for the course will be the submission of a fully referenced academic essay using the APA format. The course format will be a weekly multimedia lecture and discussion, supported by required and optional readings. Students will be able to choose their essay topic from a selection of topics.

defaultPreCourses.introduction: 概率论与数理统计是一门学习随机现象的规律性，以及学习如何有效地收集和处理带有随机误差数据的课程, 内容包括概率，事件，独立性, 随机变量，分布函数, 密度函数，数字特征和极限定理，以及统计学的基本概念，点估计， 区间估计，参数的假设检验和非参数卡方检验。
数理统计数学的一个重要的分支，研究如何有效的收集、整理和分析受随机因素影响的数据，并对所考虑的问题作出推断或预测，为采取某种决策和行动提供依据或建议. 本课程的目标主要是让学生具备一定的统计思想，掌握基本的统计学概念及统计推断的基本方法。 课程内容包括统计学基本概念、统计模型中的参数估计、区间估计、假设检验以及一些重要的非参数检验方法。

mngtDepartment.jmRemark: 预科生：谢老师 63602251老图书馆2２７室； 军训与军事理论：刑老师 63606080 东区老图书馆410室 junxing@ustc.edu.cn

courseCategory.nameEn: 原自由选修，2020秋改为一般通识，2024秋废止
courseCategory.name: 一般通识

course.introduction: 《社会科学统计软件与应用：SPSS》旨在以社会科学研究领域中最为基础的、常用的SPSS统计软件包为例，详细介绍基于SPSS统计软件包所实现的社会科学统计分析，包括：数据文件的建立和管理、数据的预处理、基本统计分析、参数检验、方差分析、非参数检验、相关分析、线性回归分析、Logistic回归分析、聚类分析、因子分析、判别分析等。在此基础上，培养学生主动发现问题和解决问题的能力，最终对统计软件所输出的结果具备答辩能力，并争取能独立写作相应的学术论文。
course.introductionEn: Statistical Software Application of Social Sciences: SPSS aims to detailly introduce the statistical analysis of the social sciences based on the most basic and commonly used SPSS statistical package in the field of social science research, including the establishment and management of data files, data pre-processing, basic statistical analysis, parametric tests, analysis of variance, non-parametric tests, correlation analysis, linear regression analysis, logistic regression analysis, the Cluster analysis, factor analysis, discriminant analysis, etc. On this basis, students will develop the ability to identify and solve problems on their own initiative, defend the results output by statistical software and strive to be able to write academic papers independently.
course.referenceTextbook: 《心理学研究设计与论文写作》张林，刘燊，北京师范大学出版社2020年9月第一版

course.introduction: 西方哲学名著导读是针对非哲学专业读者而开设的介绍西方哲学原著的课程。西方哲学的发展十分繁荣，每个时代都留下了值得后人品鉴的经典著作。这些经典著作不仅思想深刻，而且文字优美，具有永恒的价值，给人以启迪和智慧，散发出迷人的光辉。但也正是由于哲学思想的深刻性和西方思维的异域性，给中国读者尤其是非专业读者造成了理解的困难。 该课程以阅读名著为目标，以问题为线索，用通俗、轻松的授课风格，深入浅出地展示出了西方哲学经典著作中的思想魅力，意在引导大学生走进神秘的哲学殿堂，锻炼辩证思维方式。
course.introductionEn: Guiding to the Reading of Western Philosophy classics is a course for non-philosophical readers to introduce the original works of Western philosophy. The development of Western philosophy is very prosperous, and each era has left behind classic works worthy of the appreciation of later generations. These classic works are not only profound in thought, but also beautiful in writing, with eternal value, inspiring and wisdom, and exuding charming brilliance. However, it is precisely because of the profoundness of philosophical thinking and the foreignness of Western thinking that it is difficult for Chinese readers, especially non-professional readers, to understand. The course aims at reading masterpieces, taking questions as clues, using a popular and relaxed teaching style to show the ideological charm of the classics of western philosophy in a simple and profound way. It is intended to guide college students into the mysterious palace of philosophy and exercise their dialectical thinking. .
course.designateTextbook: 西方哲学原著导读 第一版 雷思温 北京:中国人民大学出版社 2020
course.referenceTextbook: 西方哲学史，本书编写组，高等教育出版社，2011

course.introduction: 黑格尔《逻辑学》历来被视为最难懂的哲学著作。本课程将采用深入浅出的方式阐释黑格尔逻辑学的研究对象、基本特点、主要内容、合理内核及其对于科学研究和发展的启迪意义，把黑格尔哲学的辩证法思想从抽象晦涩的著作中解放出来，使之在现代条件下发挥其提升人们思维能力的积极作用。
course.introductionEn: Hegel's logic has always been regarded as the most difficult philosophical work.This course will adopt the way of a simple interpretation of Hegel's logic of the research object, basic characteristics, main contents, the reasonable kernel and its significance for scientific research and development of the enlightenment, the dialectics of Hegel's philosophy thoughts from the abstract work, make it under the condition of modern play its positive role in improving the capacity of people thinking.
course.designateTextbook: 黑格尔《小逻辑》，商务印书馆2019年版

course.introduction: 课程主要介绍光机电一体化技术的基本概念和方法、科学前沿与技术进展、典型光机电一体化系统及其应用等内容。该课程强调系统化的方法，在光机电一体化的概念下多学科交叉融合，通过一个个专题和典型案例将机械、光学、电子信息、计算机控制、信号获取与处理等多种技术进行有机地结合，注重培养学生在实际中综合利用各种现代先进技术的能力。通过该课程的学习，一方面可使学生深入了解当前光机电一体化领域的热门研究方向和最新技术进展，拓展研究视野；另一方面也使其掌握系统思考问题的方法，综合利用各学科知识实现原理创新和技术突破。
course.introductionEn: This course mainly introduces the basic concepts and methods of opto-mechatronics integration technology, the frontiers of science and progress in this technology, typical systems and their applications. The course emphasizes systematic method, multi-crossed disciplines are integrated under the concept of opto-mechatronics, technologies of mechanics, optics, electronic information, computer control, and signal acquisition and processing are organically combined. This course will focus on the cultivation of students’ ability of comprehensive utilization of various modern advanced technologies in practice. Through this course, students may have an in-depth understanding of the current hot spot and the latest technology progress in opto-mechatronics research, and expand their research vision. This course could also train the students to consider problems systematically, and utilize knowledge comprehensively, which will help to make a technology breakthrough and principle innovation.
course.designateTextbook: Yock, Zenios, Makower.Biodesign: the process of innovating medica technologies（第1版），Cambridge University Press，2009年，ISBN:9780521517423.

defaultPreCourses.introduction: 微积分I课程的内容包括实数与函数、数列与函数的极限理论、函数的连续性、单变量函数微分学、单变量函数积分学。重点阐述了单变量微积分中极限、导数、积分等基本概念以及相关的大部分重要定理，如微分中值定理、泰勒定理、牛顿－莱伯尼兹公式等。

course.introductionEn: Calculus III contain Fourier series, Fourier integral, Fourier transformation, improper integral and integral depending on a parameter.　Particularly, explained the basic theory and application of Euler intergral.

course.introduction: 线性代数进阶选修课是线性代数B1课程的补充和延伸，主要针对全校(非数学类)已经选修过线性代数B1的同学。这门进阶课程将会帮助选修的同学进行线性代数已学知识的加强和若干新内容的补充, 目的是帮助同学们进一步拓宽基础，启发思路，培养分析问题和解决问题的能力。这门课也能顺带帮助有兴趣参加全国大学生数学竞赛的同学提高解决线性代数难题的能力。
course.introductionEn: The advanced elective course of linear algebra is the supplement and extension of the course of linear algebra B1, which is mainly aimed at the students who have already taken linear algebra B1 in our school (non-mathematical class). This advanced course will help students to strengthen the knowledge of linear algebra and supplement some new contents. The purpose of this course is to help students further broaden the foundation, enlighten ideas, and develop the ability to analyze and solve problems. This course can also help students interested in participating in the National College Mathematics Competition to improve their ability to solve difficult problems of linear algebra.

course.introduction: 本课程主要讲述机器人设计与制作的基础知识。本课程可分为五个部分：1．机器人制作常用工具和加工方法。2．机器人设计过程中的动力学和静力学分析方法。3．机器人的电路设计及驱动、控制方式。4．机器人制作过程中的常用传感器。5．机器人程序设计的基本算法思想。 本课程以实践为主，面向全校的大一大二的本科生课程，可提高学生们的创新思维和动手实践能力。
course.introductionEn: This course focuses primarily on the basics of the robot design and manufacture. It’s comprised of four parts: 1.The commonly used tools of robot production. 2. Dynamics and static analysis in robot design. 3. Circuit design, drive and control mode of robot. 4. Commonly used sensors of robot. 5. The basic algorithm of robot programming. This course takes practice as the main part and aim at freshman and sophomore students from all majors. It can improve students’ innovative thinking and practical ability.

course.introduction:
机械图样是人们进行技术思想交流的工具，是工程技术人员的共同语言。作为高层次的工程技术人才，必须具备画图和读图的能力，而本课程就是培养这种能力的技术基础课程，通过本课程的学习，学生将具备空间逻辑思维能力和创造性构型设计能力，掌握绘图、读图的基本技能。本课程还将在教学中引入计算机辅助绘图和三维建模技术，以期学生能够熟练掌握这一门作为现代设计不可或缺的基本技术，以适应现代设计的需要。还要使学生通过本课程的学习培养良好的工程意识和认真细致的工作作风。本课程内容：

①介绍绘制机械图样必须遵循的国家标准；

②介绍机械图样生成的原理（投影原理）、内容和表达方法；

③介绍三维实体模型和二维视图的作用；

④介绍计算机辅助绘图软件AutoCAD的使用，使学生掌握计算机绘图和标注的技能。
course.introductionEn:
Design is a kind of creative activities to solve the problem by human’s wisdom and skills. An engineering drawing is used to fully and clearly define requirements for engineered items. Engineering drawings is also a language—a graphical language that communicates ideas and information from one mind to another. The popularization and development of computer technology have brought great revolutionary change for the engineering design. Computer-aided drawing (CAD) is the most basic link and has played a decisive role. Its application is more and more widely. As soon as possible to apply CAD into professional and life of students, will add gorgeous colors to their work and daily life. The course contents include: (1) Introducing the role of 3D entity modeling and the 2D drafting; (2) Explaining the mechanism of mechanical drawings generation (projection principle and expression method, and the rules of the national standard. (3) Demonstrating the usage of AutoCAD and enable students to master the skills to plot the engineering drawing. (4) Introducing Chinese national standards about the mechanical design.

Teaching mode: paperless teaching.

course.introduction: 本课程是一门面向本科生的工程科学通识教育课程。课程教学主要由传统工艺和现代制造技术实践两部分组成。教学内容包括车铣钳焊等传统机械加工工艺、3D打印技术、数控加工技术、激光内雕加工技术、精密测量技术、超精密加工技术等，课程开展形式以学生在老师指导下进行实训为主，虚拟仿真实验学生自主上机学习为辅。
course.introductionEn: The course provides general education of engineering science for junior undergraduate students. The course form a combined teaching and training unit that addresses both traditional machining techniques and sophisticated manufacturing technologies such as turning、milling、fitting、welding、3D printing、CNC machine、laser engraving、precision measurement and Ultra-precision machining。The course was dominantly conducted by the students to be process practical training under the guidance of teachers，with the students learning by themselves in virtual simulation experiment as supplementary factor.

course.introduction: 本课程主要介绍大规模整数问题的构造与建模技术，重点介绍一些经典启发式方法和大规模问题的分解方法（包括Lagrange松弛与对偶、Bender分解方法、列生成方法、分支定价方法以及D-W分解方法等），最后初步介绍鲁棒离散优化理论与方法论。本课程学习需要选课同学结合整数规划优化软件Cplex或Grubi等就相关算例进行初步练习。
course.introductionEn: This course mainly introduces the formulation and modeling technique of large scale integer problems. We emphatically introduce some classical heuristic methods (e.g., branch and bound method, branching methods and search strategies, branch and cut method, and other heuristics) and decomposition methods for large-scale problems (including Lagrangian relaxation and duality, Bender decomposition, column generation, D - W decomposition and branch and price search, etc.). Finally, we also give a preliminary introduction on the robust discrete optimization theory and methodology. It should be noted that in this course, students need to do preliminary exercises on the given calculation examples using the integer programming optimization software, e.g., Cplex solver or Grubi solver.

course.introduction:
本课程为暑期课，多个老师上，综合学分，每个教授承担1-2个学分。主要是给暑假请的海外专家。课程内容和考试要求根据邀请的专家来定，最后综合给出学分成绩。

本课程为管理学院硕博研究生讲述管理科学相关领域的最新的前沿研究方法和最新研究动态，以培养硕博研究生进行管理科学学术研究的各项技能，包括：（1）快速阅读英文献能力；（2）对最新技术发展和商业实践敏锐观察能力；（3）恰当提取事物发展本质特征与关键科学问题能力；（4）用合适数学模型对商业问题进行建模与分析能力。

本课程邀请专家讲座的相关议题包括但不限于以下议题或领域：（1）供应链管理，（2）库存管理，（3）收益管理，（4）系统建模与仿真，（5）系统工程与系统优化，（6）医疗管理，（7）市场营销与运营管理交叉，（8）商业智能与商业分析，（9）大数据分析，（10）优化理论，（11）博弈论，（12）动态规划，（13）拍卖理论。
course.introductionEn:
The course is taught in summer term, by multiple invited professors who will specify the teaching materials and exams. The final score will be given based on overall evaluations. In this course, the frontier of the management science studies and the most advanced research methods will be taught to students. 

The course aims to educate students with various research abilities, including (i) the ability to read management science literature in English quickly, (ii) the ability to understand the newly developing technologies as well as their applications in business deeply, (iii) the ability to extract critical features of real-world problems as well as the primary research questions among them, and (iv) the ability to formulate business problems with proper mathematic models and analyze the problem based on these models. 

Topics of the talks from invited scholars will include, but not limited to, the following: (i) supply chain management; (ii) inventory management; (iii) revenue management; (iv) system modeling and simulation; (v) system engineering and system optimization; (vi) healthcare management; (vii) the interface between marketing and OM; (viii) business intelligence and business analytics; (ix) big data analytics; (x) optimization theory; (xi) game theory; (xii) dynamic programming; and (xiii) auction theory.

course.introduction: 核反应堆是核电及先进核能系统工程及核技术应用的核心设施，课程基于中国核反应堆的自主设计、研发与应用的基本历程，从科学研究到社会认知，介绍反应堆设计与安全的概念、目标、原则与分析方法。目前国际上反应堆中约三分之一是研究型反应堆（其余为核电站反应堆），其应用十分广泛且非常重要，涉及核电、医疗、电子工业、新材料技术等方面，介绍了核材料辐照考验、同位素生产、材料辐照改性、中子测量等传统及最新的应用及前景
course.introductionEn: Nuclear reactors are the core facilities of nuclear power systems, advanced nuclear energy engineering systems and other applications of nuclear technology. Based on the general course of self-design, self-development and applications of the nuclear reactors in China, this course introduces the concepts, objectives, principles and analytical methods of reactor design and safety, from scientific research to social cognition. At present, internationally, about one third of reactors are research reactors (the rest are reactors of nuclear power plants). The applications of reactors are very extensive and important, involving nuclear power, medical treatment, electronics industry, new material technology, etc. Therefore, the course also introduces traditional and latest applications and prospects of reactors, including irradiation test of nuclear material, isotope production, irradiation modification, neutron measurement, etc.
